captures.author: @Hesamation
captures.text: this 2 hour interview with Peter Steinberger (clawd) is a must-watch... he ships without checking the code, uses 5-10 agents in parallel, not vibe coding - "agentic engineering", CLOSE THE LOOP: have the agent validate its code...
captures.whyInteresting: Best practices from steipete on agentic engineering - validation loops, parallel agents, conversation over prompts

captures.author: @altryne
captures.text: Going multi-threaded with Clawd feels like a superpower. Using Clawd/Molty in single thread mode is such a shame. This agent has support for multiple conversations at once...
captures.whyInteresting: Practical insight on multi-threaded agent usage - directly relevant to Marb's setup

captures.author: @benhylak
captures.text: yesterday, i built the code review app i've been begging twitter for. live streams change summaries as claude code works, quizzes me about changes before i commit them, finds bugs locally
captures.whyInteresting: Innovative code review tool with Claude - streaming summaries + quiz before commit

captures.author: @joshcrnls
captures.text: highly recommend consolidating all your information sources into a daily briefing... summarizes all my newsletters, telegram channels, twitter bookmarks, hacker news threads, techmeme headlines
captures.whyInteresting: Same pattern as Marb's scout system - daily briefing aggregator

captures.author: @beaversteever
captures.text: Software is dead. I've posted this before but here's what I'd do now: 1. Digital electronics, 2. Verilog/HDL, 3. Computer architecture, 4. FPGA architecture...
captures.whyInteresting: Contrarian take on where to invest learning - hardware over software in AI age

captures.author: @naval
captures.text: There's no point in learning custom tools, workflows, or languages anymore.
captures.whyInteresting: Naval hot take on AI-driven skill obsolescence - controversial but worth considering

captures.author: @jparkjmc
captures.text: funny enough this is a real edtech breakthrough lol (Claude making 3blue1brown animations)
captures.whyInteresting: Claude generating 3blue1brown-style math animations - education breakthrough

captures.author: @DilumSanjaya
captures.text: Vibe coded a ship selection UI for a space exploration game. 3D assets: Nano Banana + Midjourney → Hunyuan3D. UI: Nano Banana → Gemini Pro
captures.whyInteresting: Full AI pipeline for game UI - 3D assets and code from prompts

captures.author: @mattshumer_
captures.text: If you're glued to your laptop 24/7 watching agents run: Just set up a hook that pings your phone anytime an agent needs input...
captures.whyInteresting: Practical agent workflow tip - phone notifications for agent input

captures.author: @techfrenAJ
captures.text: I found out how to run @moltbot for free after @AnthropicAI killed support. Thanks to @Kimi_Moonshot free trial!
captures.whyInteresting: Alternative provider for Moltbot - cost optimization

captures.author: @godofprompt
captures.text: Telling an LLM to 'act as an expert' is lazy and doesn't work. I tested 47 persona configurations across Claude, GPT-4, and Gemini. Generic personas = 60% quality, Specific personas = 94% quality
captures.whyInteresting: Data-backed prompting insight - specific personas beat generic

captures.author: @CR1337
captures.text: The 5 Stages of Paranoia: The Illusion of Anonymity
captures.whyInteresting: Infosec content on online anonymity - relevant to agent ops

captures.author: @nilisty
captures.text: okay so i spent 3 weeks building an AI influencer from scratch and the monetization curve is ABSOLUTELY UNHINGED... you can run 5-6 different AI personalities simultaneously
captures.whyInteresting: AI influencer monetization strategy - business model insight

captures.author: @benjitaylor
captures.text: Anthropic understands something a lot of other AI companies don't: people like cute things

captures.author: @deepfates
captures.text: I tap three Mac Minis and bring Claude onto the battlefield
captures.whyInteresting: Mac Mini cluster for Claude - same setup vibe as Marb

captures.author: @kevinxu
captures.text: this app's superpower is that if you follow the right people, you can be light years ahead of everyone else on gaining generational wealth
captures.whyInteresting: Meta-insight on X as alpha source

captures.author: @creatine_cycle
captures.text: having china is insane because it's like claude code for making things
captures.whyInteresting: China manufacturing as 'Claude Code for atoms' - interesting mental model
